title: Middle East Crisis: U.S. Officials See Hopeful Signs in Gaza Cease-Fire Talks

title: Rescued Hostage Describes Months of Uncertainty and Terror in Gaza

title: Ambani Wedding Shows Off India’s New Gilded Age

title: ‘We Want Our Real Lives Back’: For Gazans, Egypt Is Safe, but It’s Not Home

title: Defeated by A.I., a Legend in the Board Game Go Warns: Get Ready for What’s Next
